org.yamcs.utils

Class Mimetypes

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.yamcs.utils.Mimetypes

  • public class Mimetypes
extends Object
    Maps files to Internet media types based on their file extension.

    The mapping is read from a file mime.types which must be available in the classpath root.
